resources.string: App permission is required for save,backup and retrieve notes, you can give Smart Note App permission by navigating to your mobile settingsand search for Permission Manager/App Permission,then search for Smart Note and Allow Management Of All File
Deletion without backup will result in permanent lose of data
Your data is saved and it is safe to delete
Add Shopping List Or To-Do Task
Create To-Do list and add a short notes to remind you of a purpose if required
Create a Shopping list containing number of items and the total cost
Write notes,save to the database and restored whenever is needed,set a reminder for a specific not and get notification

Smart Note App is the tool designed to make creating notes easy and efficient with the alarm feature for notification whenever it is needed,also with pin and unpin method to highlight user\'s notes.\n It enable a user not only to write notes but also to create shopping list with price for each item and the total price for all listed items.\n Smart Note App further provides To-Do-Task feature with checking method ,where a user can make list and assigns description below.\n\n Thank you for using Smart Note App ,if you have any questions or suggestion pertaining Smart Note App you are welcome to write the email to the address provided below.\n smartAppdevelopment1234@gmail.com

Special Thanks to icons8 and Freepik website for providing the following icons

No Task Description click the pencil icon to add
No Recovery After Deletion of This Data

string-array.name: help_question_answers
string-array.item: How to create a notes ?#####From \"Homescreen\" click the notes icon on \"Create Sticky Notes"\ you will be then taken to \"Take Notes "screen where you will be provided with plus\ "+\" button to direct you to edit-text, \nfill both the title and the notes description,\n if you chose not to fill the title it will be automatically saved as \"Untitled\",\n then click blue,white or black button with check icon to save the notes

How to delete notes ?#####Swipe selected notes to the left to delete,\n or you can use navigation drawer and select \"Delete All Notes\"\n Be aware that this option will delete every notes you have created permanently without recovery if there was no backup,\n however you can still undo the swipe delete as long as the snackbar still displayed at the bottom screen
Recover deleted notes ?#####notes can only be recovered only if you have backup your notes before deletion.
How to backup the notes ?#####Click the icon on top-left corner of the screen to open the navigation drawer,\n then click \"Backup All Notes\"

Where is backup file located ?#####Use file manager to navigate to device files,\n then search for \"Smartnote\" folder,inside there will be two folders and \"My Notes\" which contain text documents of any saved or downloaded notes and \"notesBackup\" where the backup file is stored with the file name \"Notes_Backup.csv\"

How to transfer notes to different device#####Use the copy of backup file located inside \"Smartnotes\" folder check the previous info-view i.e\"Where is backup file located\" for more details on how to get to backup file.\n Then send the file to new device and copy it to \"notesBackup\",now open Smart Note App on \"Take Notes\" open navigation drawer and click \"Restore All Notes\"

What to do if I do not have \"Smartnotes\" folder, How can I create it ?#####Open your device file manager and create \"Smartnotes\"\n and inside create two sub-folders,\"notesBackup\" and \"My Notes\"\n CAUTION FOLDERS AND FILES SHOULD BE NAMED PRECISELY AS GIVEN BELOW\n 1 Smartnotes, 2 notesBackup, 3 My Notes this can be only be create if it was not dynamically created by Smart Note App
How to searching a notes ?#####Click the search icon on the top-right corner of the screen\n then search by either notes title or notes description.
How to pin and unpin the notes?#####Press a three-dots icon on the top-left of the notes you want to pin or unpin, a popup menu will appear, Click \"Pin/Unpin\" to pin or unpin the notes.

How to set a notification reminder#####Press a three-dots icon on the top-left of a notes you want to set a reminder to, a popup menu will appear, Click \"Set A Reminder\",you will be directed to a screen with clock dialog to set time, click \"SET ALARM\" button when you done,the alarm icon will show to the notes you had set reminder to
How to cancel notification reminder#####Press a three-dots icon on the top-left of a notes with alarm icon, a popup menu will appear, Click \"Cancel Reminder\" to cancel the reminder

About the notification #####You will receive a notification on your device that contains a title and description or content of the notes\n NOTE! it is highly recommended to click the notification instead of swiping it away,this procedure removes the alarm icon on the notes
Changing App Theme?#####You can change the theme for entire App by using a switch button on navigation drawer,\n change from light mode to night mode,or Click \"Default\" to return the default mode.
How to changing the notes color ?#####Press a three-dots icon on the top-right of the notes you want to set a color to, then different colors will appear ro choose from.

How to create price list ?#####From \"Homescreen\" click the 3 horizontal line icon on \"Make Item List\"\n you will be then taken to \"Activity \"screen where you will be provided with plus\" +\" button to direct you to edit-text, \nfill all three fields,\n then save button to save the item
Can i recover my deleted price list ?#####Both \"Item Price List\" and \"To-Do Task List\" cannot be recovered after deletion.
